General.Name: MSSCORPS Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Msscorps Co., Ltd. engages in the test and analysis of electronic materials in Asia, the Americas, and internationally. It also designs, manufacturers, retails, and wholesales electronic materials. The company provides materials analysis services, such as 3D laser confocal profile, AFM, FTIR, X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy, secondary ion mass spectrometry, cross-section polisher, curtain effect free, SEM/EDS, plasma focused ion beam, dual beam FIB/EDS, TEM/EDS, and liquid TEM for liquid nanomaterial analysis. It also offers IC circuit repair; failure analysis, including transmission line pulse, THz-TDR, thermal EMMI, nano prober systems, EMMI/InGaAs, and OBIRCH; chemical engineering analysis, such as 2D 3D X-ray, 3D optical microscopy, scanning acoustic tomography, laser decap, and delayer. Msscorps Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.
